name: ImpossibleGame
description:
This is the offline application for a streaming game

Use the chat window in the top far left.

To start to play write "join" in the chat window.

To shoot the ball use "L" for left or "R" for right then the angle amount, then the strength amount (0-50)

Example Shoot Right in a 45 degree angle with a power of 50 = R45 50
